thread.section_title: CheapTickets.de Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von CheapTickets.de | www.cheaptickets.de | 3 von 145
thread.title: Radoslav

author: Radoslav
title: Radoslav
text: This company not only provided me with a wrong referrence code for the on-line check in of Serbian Airlines, but also refused to help me further. The only good thing I've seen from that company was the 50 euro out of 175eu, which they send back to me. In general, never book with this company, it takes them days to answer emails, furthermore the answers will confuse and mislead you.
